text: Simon Beccari (born 18 November 1998) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for the club Swarovski Tirol. ==Professional career== Beccari made his professional debut with Swarovski Tirol in a 2-0 Austrian Football Bundesliga loss to Rapid Wien on 16 February 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * WSG Profile * OEFB Profile * ESPN Profile Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bolzano Category:Italian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga players Category:Italian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Austria Category:Italian expatriates in Austria Category:WSG Swarovski Tirol players
